scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: These miscellaneous papers of John Douglas Forbes for the years 1954-1986 contain forty-seven items. Most are printed including reviews of his books, articles about him, and some of his letters to editors. Personal and family papers include membership certificates, commencement programs for Peter and Pamela Forbes' graduations, a wedding announcement for Pamela, and a pathology report on Portia Forbes.
